String.string: Hunt {@creature:2#8#hoglings} in the {@Rgn:2001$$Fey Forest} and harvest their meat.
Hunt {@creature:13#1#piglings} on the {@Rgn:13001$$Island of Dawn} and harvest their meat.
Hunt {@creature:19#1003#fat piglings} in {@Rgn:19001$$Freeholds} and harvest their meat.
Hunt {@creature:23#4#forest piglings} around the {@Rgn:23001$$Lake of Tears} and harvest their meat.
Hunt {@creature:2#8#hoglings} and harvest their meat for {@LinkCreature:84#1208$$Tapa}.
Deliver the pigling meat to {@Creature:84#1208$$Tapa} at {@Rgn:84101$$Kapina Camp}.
